name: ip
description: ip - show / manipulate routing, network devices, interfaces and tunnels

metadata.syntax:
ip [ OPTIONS ] OBJECT { COMMAND | help }

       ip [ -force ] -batch filename

       OBJECT := { link | address | addrlabel | route | rule | neigh | ntable | tunnel | tuntap | maddress | mroute | mrule | monitor | xfrm | netns | l2tp |
               tcp_metrics | token | macsec | vrf | mptcp | io
metadata.example: Shows addresses assigned to all network interfaces.
examples: Shows addresses assigned to all network interfaces.
Shows the current neighbour table in kernel.
